components.description:
A small version of the large blue diamond emoji.

Note: this emoji is not supported in Twitter / X names, to minimize confusion with a verified checkmark. Learn more here.
components.title: Small Blue Diamond

description:
A small version of the large blue diamond emoji.

Note: this emoji is not supported in Twitter / X names, to minimize confusion with a verified checkmark. Learn more here.
title: Small Blue Diamond

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Geometric shapes
emoji_net_data.definition: Small Blue Diamond was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015. Copy and paste this emoji: Copy http://emojipedia.org/small-blue-diamond/
emoji_net_data.name: small blue diamond

apple_vendor_description: The small blue diamond emoji on Apple devices sparkles with a cool, rich sapphire hue, presented with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading that makes its facets gleam with life. Realistic lighting catches its edges, creating bright highlights and deep shadows that give it a precious, gem-like quality. On Apple devices, this exquisite blue diamond symbolizes purity, value, and trustworthiness, often used to represent something precious, a good idea, or a compliment.
